mapper.select: select o.orders_id as id, o.phone_number, o.project_money, o.code, o.state, o.created_at, pj.project_name, u.user_id, u.nick_name as user_nick_name, u.user_avatar, au.nick_name as admin_nick_name, au.user_id as admin_id, au.user_avatar as admin_avatar from orders o left join users u on o.user_id = u.user_id left join phone p on o.phone_number = p.phone_number left join merchant au on p.admin_user_id = au.user_id left join project pj on o.project_id = pj.project_id order by o.created_at desc

select o.user_id, o.orders_id, o.phone_number, o.created_at, o.project_money, o.state, o.code, pj.project_id, pj.project_name, pj.project_name from orders o join project pj on o.project_id = pj.project_id where o.phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
select o.orders_id, o.phone_number, o.created_at, o.project_money, pj.project_name from orders o join project pj on o.project_id = pj.project_id where o.user_id = #{userId}
